column5: I just realized that many of us are living our Canada fishing lives through John. I gotta get a life............. Pooch

You get one life and have to figure out what’s important and what are the trade offs. It’s kind of selfish but too many end up in nursing homes regretting what they passed up for whatever reason. I do think things are getting closer to allow many of us the 1-3 trips we cherish, however kudos to those who dared to make it a residence.
Yeah, but better than not. "'Tis better to have loved and lost than to never have loved at all". Or facsimile thereof. Bill
